original_title: Dunsinane Estate achieves all-time record for Western High CTC BP1 Grade
original_body_lines: Dunsinane Estate, Punduloya achieved an all-time record price of Rs. 1,420 for a BP1 grade in the Western High Grown CTC category at the Weekly Tea Auctions held on 21/22 February 2023.

The Estate is situated in the Dimbula Planting district at an elevation of 1,400 metres above sea level, and is Rainforest Alliance and ISO 22000 – food, safety and hygiene management standard certified.
Dunsinane Estate is managed by Elpitiya Plantations PLC under the stewardship of Senior Manager Asela Udumulla.
This line of teas was sold and marketed by Forbes & Walker Tea Brokers Ltd.
